name: Dread (Osokaze)
description:
You play as a bounty hunter that is taking refuge in a space station, unfortunately for you not long after arriving the space station is plagued by an unknown virus, most of the people that reside within the space station has been infected and turned into mindless monsters. Your ship was recently under maintenance and its parts are scattered across the space station. Retrieve enough parts and return to your ship to successfully escape. 

Disclaimer: This game is not Club Penguin
